title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A Chinese-American woman embarks on an epic multiverse journey to save existence.

title: CODA
description: The only hearing member of a deaf family pursues her love for singing while managing family obligations.

title: Nomadland
description: A woman in her sixties who lost everything during the Great Recession becomes a modern nomad, traveling the American West.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to work for a wealthy household, leading to a shocking and deadly outcome.

title: Green Book
description: A bouncer from the Bronx drives an African-American pianist through the racially segregated South on a concert tour.

title: The Shape of Water
description: A mute woman forms a bond with an amphibious creature held in captivity at a government lab.

title: Moonlight
description: The life of a young black man is depicted in three stages as he grapples with his identity and sexuality.

title: Spotlight
description: The Boston Globe’s investigative team uncovers widespread child abuse within the Catholic Church.

title: Birdman
description: A washed-up actor known for playing a superhero attempts to revive his career by producing a Broadway play.

title: 12 Years a Slave
description: A free black man is kidnapped and sold into slavery, enduring years of suffering before regaining his freedom.

title: Argo
description: A CIA agent uses a fake movie production as cover to rescue six Americans trapped in Iran during the 1979 hostage crisis.

title: The Artist
description: A silent film star’s career fades with the advent of talkies, while a young actress rises to fame in Hollywood.

title: The King’s Speech
description: King George VI overcomes a stutter with the help of an unconventional speech therapist during World War II.

title: The Hurt Locker
description: A bomb disposal team in Iraq faces the dangers of disarming explosives during the height of the war.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: A poor young man from Mumbai recounts his life story while competing on the Indian version of “Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?”

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter’s discovery of a drug deal gone wrong sets off a deadly pursuit by a remorseless killer.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force battle to identify each other while working for opposing sides in Boston’s crime world.

title: Crash
description: A series of interconnected stories explore race, class, and prejudice in Los Angeles.

title: Million Dollar Baby
description: A determined woman trains to become a professional boxer under the guidance of a grizzled trainer.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The epic final battle for Middle-earth unfolds as Frodo and Sam reach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

title: Chicago
description: Two murderesses compete for fame and freedom in 1920s Chicago through dazzling song-and-dance performances.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The true story of a brilliant mathematician who battles schizophrenia while making groundbreaking discoveries.

title: Gladiator
description: A Roman general seeks revenge against the emperor who betrayed him and killed his family, rising as a gladiator.

title: American Beauty
description: A suburban father experiences a midlife crisis while becoming infatuated with his daughter’s friend.

title: Shakespeare in Love
description: William Shakespeare finds inspiration for “Romeo and Juliet” through a forbidden romance with a noblewoman.

title: Titanic
description: A wealthy young woman and a poor artist fall in love aboard the doomed RMS Titanic.

title: The English Patient
description: A nurse tends to a gravely injured man in a remote Italian villa during World War II, learning of his tragic past.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads a rebellion against English rule during the 13th century.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A simple man with a kind heart witnesses and unwittingly influences major events in American history.

title: Schindler’s List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, a businessman who saved over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

title: Unforgiven
description: A retired gunslinger is drawn back into a life of violence for one last job in the Old West.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but psychopathic killer to catch another serial murderer.

title: Dances with Wolves
description: A Civil War soldier befriends a Sioux tribe while stationed in the American frontier.

title: Driving Miss Daisy
description: The relationship between a stubborn Southern widow and her African-American chauffeur evolves over decades.

title: Rain Man
description: A selfish man discovers his estranged brother, an autistic savant, and takes him on a cross-country trip.

title: The Last Emperor
description: The story of Puyi, the last Emperor of China, from his childhood to his forced abdication and eventual imprisonment.

title: Platoon
description: A young soldier faces the horrors of war and moral dilemmas while fighting in Vietnam.

title: Out of Africa
description: A Danish baroness and plantation owner reflects on her time living in Kenya during the early 20th century.

title: Amadeus
description: The life and rivalry between composers Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and Antonio Salieri is explored in this period drama.

title: Terms of Endearment
description: A mother and daughter navigate the complexities of love, family, and personal growth over several decades.

title: Gandhi
description: The life of Mahatma Gandhi, who led India to independence through nonviolent resistance, is depicted.

title: Chariots of Fire
description: Two British athletes, one Jewish and one Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics for very different reasons.

title: Ordinary People
description: A family unravels after the death of a son, struggling with grief, guilt, and emotional isolation.

title: Kramer vs. Kramer
description: A father and mother battle for custody of their young son, challenging traditional gender roles and family dynamics.

title: The Deer Hunter
description: A group of friends from a small town is forever changed by their experiences fighting in the Vietnam War.

title: Annie Hall
description: A neurotic comedian reflects on his relationship with a quirky aspiring singer in New York City.

title: Rocky
description: A small-time boxer gets a chance at the world heavyweight championship, rising against all odds.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
description: A criminal fakes insanity to serve his sentence in a mental institution, where he leads a rebellion against the oppressive staff.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The saga continues with the rise of young Vito Corleone and the expansion of Michael’s criminal empire.

title: The Sting
description: Two con men set out to avenge their friend’s murder by executing an elaborate and dangerous scam.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime family hands control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The French Connection
description: A gritty New York cop obsessively pursues a wealthy drug lord in an intense and thrilling manhunt.

title: Patton
description: The story of General George S. Patton, his controversial career, and leadership during World War II.

title: Midnight Cowboy
description: A naïve Texan moves to New York City, dreaming of wealth but instead finding an unlikely friendship with a sickly hustler.

title: Oliver!
description: A young orphan boy navigates the underworld of Victorian London in this musical adaptation of Charles Dickens’ “Oliver Twist.”

title: In the Heat of the Night
description: A black detective from Philadelphia teams up with a white Southern police chief to solve a murder in a racially tense town.

title: A Man for All Seasons
description: The life of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the king rejected the Roman Catholic Church.

title: The Sound of Music
description: A nun becomes the governess of a widower’s seven children and brings love and music into their lives, set against the backdrop of Nazi occupation.

title: My Fair Lady
description: A phonetics professor transforms a Cockney flower girl into a refined lady, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: Tom Jones
description: The romantic and comedic adventures of a foundling as he navigates love, society, and fortune in 18th-century England.
